thread.title: Locals clash with asylum-seekers in Greece

title: Locals clash with asylum-seekers in Greece
text:
Locals clash with asylum-seekers in Greece 8:43pm IST - 00:46 
Violent clashes have broken out between locals and asylum-seekers on the Greek island of Lesbos after 200 migrants camped out in the main square. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Violent clashes have broken out between locals and asylum-seekers on the Greek island of Lesbos after 200 migrants camped out in the main square. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
